blocks.text: This page doesn’t have any components. It’s just a bunch of text.

We can show a series of tabs using a callout that notes itself as a tab component using an icon.

tabs.label: Tab #1
tabs.text: This is content within the tabs.

blocks.text: We could do the same thing with a code block, where one sub-callout designates the filename of the block, which gets stylistically placed above the code.

blocks.code: function helloWorld() { console.log("Hello World"); }
